MatchyPatchy is in active development by the Conservation Technology Lab at the San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance.

To report an issue, please go to our github: MatchyPatchy Issues

MatchyPatchy

  • San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance

  • Contact
  • conservationtechlab

MatchyPatchy is a desktop application for aiding in camera trap-based re-identification for accurate population assessment.
